verses.verse: "Even <WH1571> today <WH3117> my complaint <WH7879> is rebellion; <WH4805> His hand <WH3027> is heavy <WH3513> despite <WH5921> my groaning. <WH585>
"Oh <WH4310> <WH5414> that I knew <WH3045> where I might find <WH4672> Him, That I might come <WH935> to His seat! <WH8499>
"I would present <WH6186> [my] case <WH4941> before <WH6440> Him And fill <WH4390> my mouth <WH6310> with arguments. <WH9640>
"I would learn <WH3045> the words <WH4405> [which] He would answer, <WH6030> And perceive <WH995> what <WH4100> He would say <WH559> to me.
"Would He contend <WH7378> with me by the greatness <WH7230> of [His] power <WH3581>? No, <WH3808> surely <WH389> He would pay <WH7760> attention <WH7760> to me.
"There <WH8033> the upright <WH3477> would reason <WH3198> with Him; And I would be delivered <WH6403> forever <WH5331> from my Judge. <WH8199>
"Behold, <WH2005> I go <WH1980> forward <WH6924> but He is not [there,] And backward, <WH268> but I cannot <WH3808> perceive <WH995> Him;
When He acts <WH6213> on the left, <WH8040> I cannot <WH3808> behold <WH2372> [Him;] He turns <WH9399> on the right, <WH3225> I cannot <WH3808> see <WH7200> Him.
"But He knows <WH3045> the way <WH1870> I take; <WH5973> [When] He has tried <WH974> me, I shall come <WH3318> forth <WH3318> as gold. <WH2091>
"My foot <WH7272> has held <WH270> fast <WH270> to His path; <WH9036> I have kept <WH8104> His way <WH1870> and not turned <WH5186> aside. <WH5186>

"I have not departed <WH4185> from the command <WH4687> of His lips; <WH8193> I have treasured <WH6845> the words <WH561> of His mouth <WH6310> more <WH4480> than <WH4480> my necessary <WH2706> food. <WH2706>
"But He is unique <WH259> and who <WH4310> can turn <WH7725> Him? And [what] His soul <WH5315> desires, <WH183> that He does. <WH6213>
"For He performs <WH9608> what <WH2706> is appointed <WH2706> for me, And many <WH7227> such <WH1992> [decrees] are with Him.
"Therefore, <WH5921> <WH3651> I would be dismayed <WH926> at His presence; <WH6440> [When] I consider, <WH995> I am terrified <WH6342> of Him.
"[It is] God <WH410> [who] has made my heart <WH3820> faint, <WH7401> And the Almighty <WH7706> [who] has dismayed <WH926> me,
But I am not silenced <WH6789> by the darkness, <WH2822> Nor <WH3808> deep gloom <WH652> [which] covers <WH3680> [me.]
